shortdesc.ph: Used to set the video stream for local composite layout.
Used to configure video streams in local composition.

section.p: Used to configure the position, size, layer, and other information of each video stream in local composition.

plentry.pd: Video source type. See .
Remote user ID. Used only when the video source type is VIDEO_SOURCE_REMOTE.
File path of the local image. For example: Windows: C:\Users\{username}\Pictures\image.png. Used only when the video source type is image.
Media player ID. Used only when the video source type is VIDEO_SOURCE_MEDIA_PLAYER.
Horizontal offset of the top-left corner of the video relative to the canvas origin (top-left corner of the canvas).
Vertical offset of the top-left corner of the video relative to the canvas origin (top-left corner of the canvas).
Width of the video on the canvas (in pixels).
Height of the video on the canvas (in pixels).

Layer index of the video. Range is [0, 100].
0: (Default) Bottom layer.
100: Top layer.

Transparency of the video. Range is [0.0, 1.0].
0.0: Completely transparent.
1.0: Fully opaque.

pd.note: This parameter only takes effect for camera-type video sources.

plentry.pd: Remote user ID. Used only when sourceType is set to VIDEO_SOURCE_REMOTE for local composition.
Video source type. See .
File path of the local image, for example: Android: /storage/emulated/0/Pictures/image.png. Used only when sourceType is set to image for local composition.
Media player ID. Used only when sourceType is set to VIDEO_SOURCE_MEDIA_PLAYER.
Horizontal offset of the top-left corner of the video relative to the canvas origin (top-left corner).
Vertical offset of the top-left corner of the video relative to the canvas origin (top-left corner).
Width of the video on the canvas (pixels).
Height of the video on the canvas (pixels).

Layer index of the video, range [0, 100].
0: (default) bottom layer.
100: top layer.

Transparency of the video, range [0.0, 1.0].
0.0: fully transparent.
1.0: fully opaque.

pd.note: This parameter only takes effect for camera-type video sources.
